records.location_details: Dead body found in Evros River area, Greece, by Hellenic Police during patrol.
records.context_note: A dead body (male, 20-25 years old) was found in the Evros River area by Hellenic Police officers during a patrol. No travel documents were found. The body was transferred to Alexandroupolis hospital for autopsy to determine the cause of death.
records.evidence_quote: Subject: Dead body found in Evros River. Dead persons: 1. On 08.01.2020 at 13:30 Hellenic Police Officers of Text Removed - Justification 4, who were patrolling the operational area Text Removed - Justification 4, detected a dead body (male), age betwen 20-25 years old in Evros Area. No travel document have been found.
